titles.title: FLORICH Act
Founding Legacies of Reserve Integral Combat-training Heroes Act of 2015
To provide for the eligibility for burial in Arlington National Cemetery of certain members of reserve components of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
6/23/2015--Introduced. FLORICH Act or Founding Legacies of Reserve Integral Combat-training Heroes Act of 2015
This bill makes eligible for burial in Arlington National Cemetery, Arlington, Virginia, any member of a reserve component of the Armed Forces who dies while on inactive-duty training during a mission in which a member of the Armed Forces serving on active duty also dies.
